replies.user_apartment_search_ask_apartment: I need to find an apartment.
replies.apartment_ask_num_bedrooms: How many bedrooms does the apartment need to have?
replies.apartment_ask_floor: Are you looking for an apartment on a specific floor?
replies.apartment_ask_balcony: Does the apartment need to have a balcony?
replies.apartment_ask_nearby_pois: Are you looking for an apartment near specific surroundings?
replies.db_apartment_search_inform_search_result: [RESULT] APIName = apartment_search ; BalconySide = [DIRECTION]; FloorSquareMeters = [NUMBER] ; HasBalcony = [BOOLEAN]; HasElevator = [BOOLEAN]; Level = [NUMBER]; MaxLevel = [NUMBER]; Name = [APARTMENT_NAME]; NearbyPOIs = [POI] ; NumRooms = [NUMBER] ; Price = [NUMBER]; id = [NUMBER];
replies.apartment_inform_search_result:
OK, I found a free flat in {apartment_name:s}, located near {pois:s}, that is matching your search criteria.
It is on level {floor:d}, has {size:d} square meters and {num_bedrooms:d} bedrooms.
It {has_balcony:s} and {has_elevator:s}, and comes at the price of {price:d} per month.
replies.apartment_inform_nothing_found: Unfortunately there are no apartments that match your search. Would you like to change any of your criteria?
replies.user_apartment_change_criteria: criteria changes: how about no balcony / lower?
replies.apartment_ask_search_more: Would you like to search for any more apartments?
replies.user_apartment_search_more: Yes, I'd like to keep searching.
replies.apartment_inform_search_criteria: I can apply the following filters: number of bedrooms, price, floor, balcony, elevator and nearby POIs.
replies.anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
replies.out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you search for apartments.
